name: PODVODNIK: AN UNDERWATER HORROR EXPERIENCE
description:
Retro style fps horror.

Go to the depths of the sea and collect mysterious artifacts.

Beware of sharks.

Info:

WASD - move

E - pickup mysterious artifacts.

R - replenish oxygen at the station.

X - use some buttons.

F - turn off light.

Escp - Quit game any time.

Spacebar - Place a beacon.

Update : Twicking balance of sharks.
